H0.text: Weaker bones is an effect of regular exercise.

H1.text: Less energy is an effect of regular exercise.

H2.text: Better hearing is an effect of regular exercise.

H3.text: Stronger heart is an effect of regular exercise.

A4.text: Physical exercise can also contribute to maintaining a healthy weight, regulating the digestive system, building and maintaining healthy bone density, muscle strength, and joint mobility

A5.text: The beneficial effect of exercise on the cardiovascular system is well documented
